audio_description: Today, the biryani recipe we’re going to share with you — believe me, whether it's a professional chef or home cook, this recipe will impress everyone. It's a very delicious and aromatic biryani.

audio_description: Now we're taking rice — for 1 kg of chicken, we’ve taken 1 kg of rice. We soaked it for two hours. We’ve used Golden Sella rice. You can use any rice of your choice.

audio_description: After taking out the whole spices, add 2 tablespoons of mint and 2 tablespoons of coriander, and juice from half a lemon. This makes the rice fluffy and flavorful. Now add the soaked rice.
